name: Learning Management System
description: A platform for learning high-school level mathematics. Users can select from many courses each with chapters and tasks that check understanding of the topic. Admin panel allows for easy and intuitive course/task creation and assigning users to courses.

name: Gitoptim
description: Developed as part of my Bachelor's thesis in Computer Science in a group of 4 people. Web application that utilizes Large Language Models to analyze code in git repositories. It reports bugs, offers code improvement suggestions, and automates the generation of unit and Memlab tests.

name: Kava - programming language
description: Kava is a programming language inspired by Kotlin with elements borrowed from Java and JavaScript. It is statically typed, interpreted, and supports functions as first-class citizens. It is designed to be simple and easy to learn, with a syntax that is similar to other popular languages.
